ygData.subject: RE: SoW vs Selos (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The other night, I was running through SK with a couple of guildmates, a level 22 ranger (grouped with me), and a level 45 shaman (not grouped with me).
ygData.messageBody:
>
> As example of how great accel is compared to sow, last night i was
>47 pounds over and i was still running faster then my druid friend that was
>in wolf form. They need to make sow removable by clicking on it
>
> Minkin
> Sol Ro


The other night, I was running through SK with a couple of guildmates, a
level 22 ranger (grouped with me), and a level 45 shaman (not grouped with
me). The shaman had SoW on, I had Selos with drum going. We actually had to
stop and wait for the shaman to catch up to us. I know Selos is faster than
SoW, but I sure did get a kick out of the shaman's amazement at how much
faster Selos is. ;-)

-Treehugger and Songmaker
